copied.title: Copied
copied.description: The access key has been copied to the clipboard

errors.failedToGetKey: Failed to get the VPN key

steps.three: Enter the access key you received after clicking the "Get VPN key" button on this website.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The requested page doesn't exist or was moved.

error.title: An error occurred
error.descriptionDefault: Something went wrong. Please try again.

global.title: Critical error
global.descriptionDefault: Something broke. Try reloading the page.

forbidden.title: Access denied
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to view this page (403).
